xs:annotation.xs:documentation: Root: container for information to be delivered and published
Metadata on the delivered cdbxml document

For information purposes. Contains one or more of following values separated by line feed: subscriptioncode (contract under which information is send), subsriptionversion, creationdate (of XML document), exporttype (delta or full), filesequencenumber (10 digit number) and name of publisher
processing information defining the owner, validator and process status
Description of the owner of the information
Description of the validator of the information
Status description for the processing
Event information, contains: production information + location (where) + calender (when) info
Actors are: organisations and persons of cultural relevance (artists, locations, organisors, ...)
Links to web sites of cultural relevance
"potential" event, ready to be organised. Contains common event data such as title, description, images, ...
Categorisation information. Used to categorise the various information elements in order to allow fine grained selection and searching.
Cities in Flanders and Brussels divided in regions defined by CultuurNet
Deleted objects
Defines the type of the deleted object, e.g. event, actor, link.
